description: Electronic hardware and component parts and accessories
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

**Publication Date:** October 26, 2023
**Closing Date:** November 10, 2023, 14:00:00

**Tender Reference Number:** CB-318-27720087
**Amendment Number:** 5
**Solicitation Number:** 30004854

We are seeking a supplier to provide a test set, non-custom, in support of our requirements. The government requires one (1) quantity of this item under Standing Offer (SO) E60HN-16ELEC, authorized for the Quebec region.

This requirement is only open to Supply Arrangement (SA) holders under the RFSA series E60HN-16ELEC authorized for the region of delivery. Interested parties must review the attached tender notice for full details on how to submit a proposal.

**Tender Details:**
- **GSIN:** Not Applicable
- **UNSPSC:** 32130000 Electronic hardware and component parts and accessories
- **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Opportunity:** None
- **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (except National Capital Region) and Sept-Îles
- **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
- **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Proposal Submissions:**
All proposals must be submitted electronically through the supplier registration portal. Lat Sections 11 to 23 of the tender notice contain the RFP instructions.

**Contact Information:**
- **Name:** Stephanie Patry
- **Email:** [stephanie.patry@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:stephanie.patry@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
- **Phone:** (343) 576-8973

To obtain the tender notice, please visit our website at [CanadaBuys](http://canadabuys.canada.ca) ([ choose language ] option) and search for the tender number 30004854. Please direct any inquiries to Stephanie Patry at (343) 576-8973. Best regards. Government of Canada.HideInInspector
